title: How to Make a Vegetable and Cheese Omelet

steps.headline: Spray the pan with cooking spray and place it on medium heat.
Dice the tomatoes, bell peppers, and mushrooms.
steps.description: Add everything in the pan and cook thoroughly.

steps.headline: Crack the eggs in a separate bowl and add the water & salt and pepper to it.
Beat with a fork or whisk until combined.
Pour the egg mixture on the vegetables.
Cook until sides are dry gently pivoting pan to ensure evenness.
Flip omelet and cook on other side.
Put the cheese side on plate.
Gently flip other side over to have half circle.

text: Spray the pan with cooking spray and place it on medium heat.  Dice the tomatoes, bell peppers, and mushrooms. Add everything in the pan and cook thoroughly. Crack the eggs in a separate bowl and add the water & salt and pepper to it.  Beat with a fork or whisk until combined.  Pour the egg mixture on the vegetables.  Cook until sides are dry gently pivoting pan to ensure evenness.  Flip omelet and cook on other side.  Add shredded cheese to half.  Put the cheese side on plate.  Gently flip other side over to have half circle.
